title: Ezukanma, Deaton picked on final day of NFL Draft - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content:
1. Ezukanma, Deaton picked on final day of NFL Draft - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  2. Texas Tech WR Erik Ezukanma selected in NFL draft  The Dallas Morning News
  3. Dolphins select Texas Tech WR Erik Ezukanma with No. 125 overall pick  Miami Herald
  4. NFL Draft 2022: Miami Dolphins pick Erik Ezukanma, WR, Texas Tech  The Phinsider
  5. Dolphins select Texas Tech WR Erik Ezukanma, who prepped with Mahomes  Palm Beach Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Texas Tech wide receiver Erik Ezukanma and offensive lineman Dawson Deaton were both selected during the final day of the 2022 NFL Draft on Saturday as Ezukanma was picked in the fourth round by the Miami Dolphins followed by Deaton in the seventh round with the Cleveland Browns.
